storyInfo:
The Doctor's plan succeeds in confounding the Silverash side.
Ensia reaches the foot of Mt. Karlan without a hitch and begins to climb, while Degenbrecher is intercepted by Sharp, the two prepared to battle at the drop of a pin.

attributes.content: Sir, I've searched the woodlands around the perimeter of the Paleroche clan and found no signs of mobilization.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Keep looking.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Gnosis, we've got an issue.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Gulo split from the Doctor's forces and led a team around Mount Karlan, breaking through the pass and occupying the station there!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Right now, Gulo is driving everyone out of the station, and another team is heading for Klin.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: That's where Yucatan is being held... Is this a rescue operation?
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Impossible. They're being far too inefficient for that. There must be another motive.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Monch, based on the route you saw them taking, where do you think the Doctor is headed?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...They chose a route that could lead either to Mount Karlan or to the pass.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Oh... Could the Doctor intend to bypass Mount Karlan to directly attack our territory?
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: I should've warned you about this possibility.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No, I was caught off guard myself. I should've stationed more troops at the pass.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Doctor...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But, Arctosz still hasn't shown himself, and we cannot say for sure what their true objective is...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Grr, I'll have Valais head to the station to deal with Gulo, then Weiss will go to Klin.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Have a portion of the troops stationed at the base of the mountain go defend the pass and prevent the Doctor's forces from breaking through to our territory.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: General, we've already taken control of the station. Why are we still waiting here?
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: The Doctor told us to avoid hurting anyone, but I didn't hear anything about not smashing the place up. This station is a symbol of Silverash treachery.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Calm down. We'll see when the next train arrives––
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Grr... When's the thing supposed to arrive anyway? Let me see the note the Doctor left me...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Okay, that sounds about right.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Huh?! What's going on here?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant A

attributes.content: This station now belongs to Gulo of the Paleroche clan! Get out of here, if you value your life!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Why is the Paleroche clan here?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant B

attributes.content: And it's none other than the terrible Gulo! Did the Paleroches declare war?!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant A

attributes.content: Ugh... I'm too young to die! Run!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant B

attributes.content: That's right! Run, faster!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Umm... General Gulo, thanks for bringing me along.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hmph. I would want nothing to do with a Silverash daughter, if not for the fact that the Doctor told me you were helping.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: You really aren't in cahoots with that brother of yours?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I'm here to stop him.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: ...I don't trust you, but I do trust the Doctor. The one called Sharp told me to trust in the victory the Doctor would bring.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Alright. Didn't you say you had to make your way up the mountain? Off with you.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: After you go, I'll have to halt the railroad... to do what again? Oh, right, gotta stop things from running so that Silverash reinforcements don't show up too quickly.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Well, thanks anyway, General Gulo!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: These people make no sense to me at all.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Whatever. I have my own things to do anyway.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Hmph, that musclehead might not be the sharpest tool in the shed, but he certainly does know how to fight.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: He should be fine holding down the station.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Next up is... Dammit, my ass..
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Madame, why don't you get off the burdenbeast and rest for a bit? The rest of us can handle things.
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior A

attributes.content: Hmph. I don't have the luxury for that right now.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Our task is much more difficult than Gulo's.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: In addition to rescuing Yucatan, we also have to take as much of Klin as we can.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Until the Doctor wins over on the other end, we have to draw the Silverashes' attention.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Madame, can we really hold out against those numbers with the forces we have here? Are you sure this Doctor isn't just using us as fodder?
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior A

attributes.content: That's right, the Matriarch...
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior B

attributes.content: Shut it.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Listen, Ratatos is sick and tired of carrying this clan on her back, so she's trusting this to me.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: We're at a do or die moment for the house of Browntail. If we succeed, the Browntail clan might just have a future. If we fail, we're all changing our names to Silverash.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I don't care what Enciodes is trying to do or what he wants Kjerag to be, but us Browntails will never be anyone's fodder.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If you're that eager to get a new name, then you can leave now. But if being a Browntail means anything to you, then come with me!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (I've never seen Sciurus so charismatic before...)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior A

attributes.content: (I didn't know Sciurus had such a talent for speeches...)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior B

attributes.content: (I think she really is speaking her mind. She's just never been given a chance before.)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior C

attributes.content: What are you mumbling about over there?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Even though I heard that the Matriarch herself was planning on surrendering, if Sciurus isn't willing to give up, then...)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior A

attributes.content: (It would be really shameful for us to raise the white flag.)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior B

attributes.content: (That's right. And to be honest, I find it hard to believe that the Matriarch would do something like that...)
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warrior C

attributes.content: You're still not done? If you don't like it here, then beat it!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: We fight for the house of Browntail!
attributes.name: Browntail Clan Warriors

attributes.content: Hmph, that's more like it.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Alright, I'll handle the rest.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Are you serious about this?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'm a bona-fide pro.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You'd better not die on us.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I'll be waiting for the good news.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: As much as I've trained, it's been a long time since I've done any real mountaineering. Not since I came to Rhodes Island for treatment.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This sure is getting my blood pumping, haha...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Wait for me, sis. I'm coming for you.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia remembers how when she was a child, she always loved bringing her sister along to her climbs.
Though she was physically fit, she'd always give up halfway through.
Her favorite thing to do was to curl up on the sofa by the fire, knitting something for herself or her brother, or just napping.
'My sister probably doesn't like the mountains.' That's what Ensia thought.
But in the end, after becoming the Saintess, she was bound atop the mountain.
Ensia always had a dream – that one day, she would save her sister from the mountain.
General, this railway should be useless now, right?
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: No clue. But it probably isn't gonna work anymore.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But who gives a shit. The other job the Doctor gave us was to start some chaos in Silverash territory, the bigger the better.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Since we've already messed this place up pretty good, let's go somewhere else––
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: You sure took your sweet time, Valais.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Gulo, what exactly is the Doctor after?
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: The sentimental side of me actually wants to tell you.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But, honestly, I got no clue what the Doctor is trying to do either, hahaha!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But what I do know is, I'm here to make enough trouble to give Enciodes a tough time!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Gulo, I'd prefer not to humiliate you.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Or any of the excellent warriors of the Paleroche clan.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: So lay down your arms. You have no chance of winning.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Valais, I know you've got some bad blood, and I'm not good at comforting people.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I also know that there's nothing I can do to bring back what you've lost.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But I'm happy to rumble with you. Let you blow off your steam.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Phew... That should be it for the first checkpoint.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ah... If I remember right, this trail was part of the trial to become a Saintess.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia remembers, the night before the selection of the Saintess, her sister had some kind of fight with her brother.
That night, she sat alone on the sofa in the living room until the sun came up.
She still remembered telling her sister that if not for the fact that she was too young, she would've joined the Saintess selection process herself. Her sister smacked her upside the head.
Her sister was quite strong.
But never did she expect that this would be the last time her sister would smack her around.
Sir, it's starting to snow.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Officer

attributes.content: A good opportunity.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Kjeragandr smiles upon us, by the look of things.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Though it took a lot of extra time to make our way to the Holy Hunt, it was well worth it.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Officer

attributes.content: How's the situation at the foot of the mountain?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It seems like the Doctor was able to divert their attention. The forces stationed there were far fewer than we expected.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Officer

attributes.content: Haha, good! Very good! The Doctor is quite capable!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Still, we can't afford to bring shame to the Paleroche name.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Warriors, now that our time is nigh, we need no longer conceal ourselves.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Forget the Silverashes! Follow me – we'll rush up the mountain and rescue the Saintess!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir!
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warriors

attributes.content: Why'd it have to start snowing now...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Old Kjeragandr really has a dry sense of humor.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Or, maybe this is a test for me, as the sister of the Saintess?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Well, whatever.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: A bit of wind and snow can't hold me back!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You can do this, Ensia! You weren't just talking big in front of Aurora! You've got this!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It was hard to send letters back to Kjerag from Rhodes Island.
Usually, she would only get the opportunity when Courier showed up.
Each time he visited, she always felt conflicted.
Fortunately, Courier would bring a letter from her sister.
Unfortunately, Courier and Matterhorn would always treat her like a kid, as if she couldn't see the sadness on their faces.
She is also a child of the Silverash family. She read the books left behind by her parents and knew of the vision they had for Kjerag. She also got good grades in Hypatia's class!
Of course she knew.
What she did not know is... Did things have to turn out like this?
If so, then why her family?
Sir, troops led by Arctosz suddenly appeared at the foot of the mountain and broke through the defensive line!
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Grr... Where'd they come from?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm afraid they entered the site of the Holy Hunt, so our men were unable to track them down...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: And our forces stationed there couldn't stop them?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: A portion of the forces were split off to defend the pass, plus it suddenly started snowing, and morale was low to begin with. Since their goal was to break through the line...
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: You've been outplayed, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You made the right call. They care only about Mount Karlan and the Saintess. Everything else is secondary to that.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Did you come back only to mock me?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No, I would've hesitated too, in your position.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Just as you used your longstanding reputation within Karlan Trade to put on a play of half-truths...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Our lack of familiarity with the Doctor worked to that one's advantage – no shortage of tricks up those mysterious sleeves.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You may believe that the Doctor has designs on Kjerag, but from my perspective, I don't necessarily think that the Saintess is the only objective.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Of course, the Doctor could not be sure that we would see things this way, and that was the wager.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That you'd see the Doctor's actions around the pass as a move against Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Doctor only required that you be sufficiently concerned about this possibility to send your troops to assuage those concerns.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As such, the Doctor won the bet.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes, your arrogance is truly loathsome. To wax admiringly about the actions of your enemy at a time like this.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: This is not a game, and we cannot afford to fail.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I am not a fan of failure, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I've already sent Degenbrecher.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: To intercept Arctosz?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No... Why do you think the Doctor chose a route that could lead either to Mount Karlan or the pass?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You're saying that Arctosz's forces are a ruse.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: From the very beginning, the Doctor's forces were both the bait and the main force.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: No wonder why they were moving so slowly. They were waiting.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's right. And, if I'm not mistaken, this is when they will start making their move.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If the Doctor is allowed to group with Arctosz, then there would be real trouble.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Ensia already knows.
She knows her wish cannot come true.
She cannot save her sister from the mountain.
She also cannot mend the relationship between her two siblings.
How could she have no idea as to what her brother seeks to accomplish?
How could she not see that the rift between the two was only growing wider and wider?
But what can she do?
She doesn't like to cry, to vent her frustrations to others, or to give up.
All she can do is wedge the climbing pick in her hand into the rock above her head, and momentarily forget some of her troubles as she overlooks the scenery from atop the mountain.
Drifting snow strikes her face, leaving traces that look like streaks of tears.
Doctor, Master Arctosz has begun to move.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: We've also heard that the Silverashes are reinforcing the pass.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: So far, everything is proceeding as you have planned.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: So she's here.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: This is as far as you go, Rhodes Islander.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I remember your codename. You're Sharp.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Lucky the Doctor brought some spare clothes.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: So that's what's going on. This entire army is both the genuine article and also a decoy.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: To be precise, this plan was specially tailored to you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: The Doctor had to plan for a contingency that included a woman strong enough to tear any plan to shreds.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I am not Enciodes. The admiration and respect of my enemies mean nothing to me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: The only thing I need of my enemies is for them to be strewn across the ground.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Then you're in luck. You've got a whole army of opponents right in front of you.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: You're the only one in this crowd worthy of being my opponent.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Degenbrecher shakes her head, sighing as if offering an immutable truth within her opinion.
Sharp looks at the woman before him, and for some reason, is reminded of his friend Stormeye, a fellow elite operator.
Stormeye would've been very happy to face an opponent like her.
But to him, whether mingling with the army here, or dealing with Degenbrecher, all of this is just a part of the job.
It's a shame, an enemy's respect doesn't do much for me either.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: I dislike glory, but you don't seem to care about it at all.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Nothing personal. It's just business.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Just business?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Doing business requires professionalism. Only an amateur would bring personal feelings to the job.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: There's nothing worth bragging about when it comes to my combat abilities. It's just one of my tools to get the job done.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Hahaha, I like the way you think.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I've always despised self-righteous challengers, pumped up on their skills or ideals.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And, without exception, I crushed them all underfoot.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I have heard of your feats as The Black Knight.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: A Leithanian who cannot use Arts, rendering all dignity and pride worthless before your greatsword.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Where is that greatsword, by the way?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Waving something like that around in this unsophisticated place would only scare the natives, so I decided to switch weapons.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Not that it matters what I use, though.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Degenbrecher flourishes the blade in her hand, and in the blink of an eye, the wind and snow itself seem to cleave in two.
As for me, I was promised victory.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Sharp bends forward slightly, placing his hand on the hilt of the standard-issue knife at his waist.
Degenbrecher notices a familiar scent from him.
Back when she was in Kazimierz, only a few people gave off this same scent.
The scent of war.
